import React, { Component } from "react"; import { FiCheck } from "react-icons/fi"; import axios from "../../axios"; import Footer from "../Footer/Footer"; import Header from "../Header/Header"; export default class WorkItemDetail extends Component { state = { name: null, content: null, photo: null, title: null, Requirements: null, Requirements1: null, Requirements2: null, Requirements3: null, Requirements4: null, Requirements5: null, Requirements6: null, Requirements7: null, footer: null, error: null, success: null, deleted: null, loading: false, }; goBack = () => { this.props.history.goBack(); }; handleType = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; this.setState({ [name]: value, error: null, success: null }); }; componentDidMount = () => { this.setState({ loading: true }); axios .get("works/" + this.props.match.params.id) .then((result) => this.setState({ ...result.data.data, error: null, loading: false }) ) .catch((err) => { this.setState({ error: err.response.data.error.message, loading: false, }); }); }; render() { return (

{this.state.name}

{this.state.name}
{this.state.title}
Анкет татах

Ажлын байранд тавигдах шаардлага

{this.state.Requirements1}
{this.state.Requirements2}
{this.state.Requirements3}
{this.state.Requirements4}
{this.state.Requirements5}
{this.state.Requirements6}
{this.state.Requirements7}
{this.state.footer}
); } }
